mapper.sql: id, nickname, password, phone, email, gmt_create, gmt_modify, status, salt
mapper.insert: insert into rtc_user (id, nickname, password, phone, email, gmt_create, gmt_modify, status, salt) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into rtc_user
id,
nickname,
password,
phone,
email,
gmt_create,
gmt_modify,
status,
salt,

mapper.update:
update rtc_user
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update rtc_user set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id from rtc_user where email = #{email, jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}
select id from rtc_user where phone = #{email, jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}
